description:
Windows device driver installation and management tool.

This little self-contained, no-dependency tool can be built either as a console application or a Windows application which has no visible window (ideal to use in combination with setup makers).
It offers a command-line-based driver (un-)installer and allows for simple manipulation of class filter entries.
What's Changed
- Bump actions/checkout from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in #12
- Bump microsoft/setup-msbuild from 1.3.1 to 1.3.2 by @dependabot in #13
- Bump microsoft/setup-msbuild from 1.3.2 to 2.0.0 by @dependabot in #14
- Adds "devcon install" compatible command and major refactor by @nefarius in #16
- Fixed a logging regression where a default myeasylog.log file got generated no matter the provided CLI flags in
